title: Burger
description: Burger is a burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM. I was sure to follow the MVC design pattern. This app uses Node and MySQL to query and route data in this app, and Handlebars to generate your HTML.

title: Clicky React Game
description: Clicky Game is a memory game made with React. It is a basic React app to work with state.

title: Amman Imman Field App
description: A collaborative project that allows field nurses to train individuals on health and sanitation practices using images rather than text because of many different languages in different villages.
